title: ‘Sherman’s Showcase’ Is Back, Silly Smarts Intact
description: Spaceship? Check. Trap nursery rhymes? Check. Dashikis? Check. After a long pandemic hiatus, this musical comedy tribute to Black culture has returned, as joyfully absurd as ever.
dc:creator: Leigh-Ann Jackson
media:credit: Rozette Rago for The New York Times
media:description: Bashir Salahuddin, as Sherman McDaniels, during filming for the second season of “Sherman’s Showcase.” The musical spoof is returning to TV more than three years after it debuted.
